entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , L'Anse-au-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:56 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -19.7°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 72 %

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 40 percent chance of flurries later in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
